member.name: M:FlagsmithEngine.Engine.GetEnvironmentFeatureStates(FlagsmithEngine.Environment.Models.EnvironmentModel)
member.summary: Get a list of feature states for a given environment

member.name: M:FlagsmithEngine.Engine.GetEnvironmentFeatureState(FlagsmithEngine.Environment.Models.EnvironmentModel,System.String)
member.summary: Get a specific feature state for a given feature_name in a given environment
member.param: name of a feature to get

member.name: M:FlagsmithEngine.Feature.Models.FeatureStateModel.IsHigherPriority(FlagsmithEngine.Feature.Models.FeatureStateModel)
member.summary: Another FeatureStateModel is deemed to be higher priority if and only if it has a FeatureSegment and either this.FeatureSegment is null or the value of other.FeatureSegment.priority is lower than that of this.FeatureSegment.priority.
